00026     typedef signed char    int8;
00027     typedef unsigned char  int8u;
00028     typedef signed short   int16;
00029     typedef unsigned short int16u;
00030     typedef signed int     int32;
00031     typedef unsigned int   int32u;

00035     const double pi = 3.14159265358979323846;

00038     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039     struct color 
00040     {
00041         int16u r;
00042         int16u g;
00043         int16u b;
00044         int16u a;
00045         color() : r(0), g(0), b(0), a(65535) {}
00046         color(unsigned r_, unsigned g_, unsigned b_, unsigned a_) :
00047             r(int16u(r_)), g(int16u(g_)), b(int16u(b_)), a(int16u(a_)) {}
00048     };
00049 
00050 
00051     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052     inline color rgba8(unsigned r, unsigned g, unsigned b, unsigned a=255)
00053     {
00054         return color(r<<8, g<<8, b<<8, a<<8);
00055     }
00056 
00057 
00058     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059     inline color rgb8_packed(unsigned rgb, unsigned a=255)
00060     {
00061         return rgba8(rgb, rgb>>8, rgb>>16, a);
00062     }
00063 
00064     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065     inline color bgr8_packed(unsigned bgr, unsigned a=255)
00066     {
00067         return rgba8(bgr>>16, bgr>>8, bgr, a);
00068     }
00069 
00070     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071     inline color rgba8_packed(unsigned rgba)
00072     {
00073         return rgba8(rgba, rgba>>8, rgba>>16, rgba>>24);
00074     }
00075 
00076     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077     inline color abgr8_packed(unsigned abgr)
00078     {
00079         return rgba8(abgr>>24, abgr>>16, abgr>>8, abgr);
00080     }
00081 
00082     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083     inline color rgba16(unsigned r, unsigned g, unsigned b, unsigned a=65535)
00084     {
00085         return color(r, g, b, a);
00086     }
00087 
00088     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089     inline color rgba(double r, double g, double b, double a=1.0)
00090     {
00091         return color(unsigned(r*65535.0), 
00092                      unsigned(g*65535.0), 
00093                      unsigned(b*65535.0), 
00094                      unsigned(a*65535.0));
00095     }

00098     enum
00099     {
00100         poly_base_shift = 8,
00101         poly_base_size  = 1 << poly_base_shift,
00102         poly_base_mask  = poly_base_size - 1
00103     };
00104

00107     enum
00108     {
00109         line_base_shift = 4,
00110         line_base_size  = 1 << line_base_shift,
00111         line_base_mask  = line_base_size - 1
00112     };
00113

00115     //------------------------------------------------------------------------

00117     {
00118         img_base_shift = 4,
00119         img_base_size  = 1 << img_base_shift,
00120         img_base_mask  = img_base_size - 1
00121     };

00124     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00125     enum
00126     {
00127         aa_levels_shift = 8,
00128         aa_levels_num   = 1 << aa_levels_shift,
00129         aa_levels_mask  = aa_levels_num - 1,
00130         aa_levels_2num  = aa_levels_num * 2,
00131         aa_levels_2mask = aa_levels_2num - 1
00132     };

00135     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136     inline int line_coord(double c)
00137     {
00138         return int(c * line_base_size);
00139     }
00140 
00141     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00142     inline int poly_coord(double c)
00143     {
00144         return int(c * poly_base_size);
00145     }

00148     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149     struct rect
00150     {
00151         int x1;
00152         int y1;
00153         int x2;
00154         int y2;
00155 
00156         rect() : x1(0), y1(0), x2(0), y2(0) {}
00157         rect(int x1_, int y1_, int x2_, int y2_) : 
00158            x1(x1_), y1(y1_), x2(x2_), y2(y2_) {}
00159 
00160         void normalize()
00161         {
00162             int t;
00163             if(x1 > x2) { t = x1; x1 = x2; x2 = t; }
00164             if(y1 > y2) { t = y1; y1 = y2; y2 = t; }
00165         }
00166 
00167         bool clip(const rect& r)
00168         {
00169             if(x1 < r.x1) x1 = r.x1;
00170             if(y1 < r.y1) y1 = r.y1;
00171             if(x2 > r.x2) x2 = r.x2;
00172             if(y2 > r.y2) y2 = r.y2;
00173             return x1 <= x2 && y1 <= y2;
00174         }
00175     };
00176

00191     };

00196     {
